segments.text: May I see your passport please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is my passport . And this is the declaration form .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the purpose of your visit to the United States ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Business . I have a trade convention I'm attending in Chicago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This visa is good for two weeks . Do you intend to stay longer than that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I will fly back twelve days from now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And you will do some traveling while you are here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I want to spend a couple days in New York . I have friends there I will visit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you have in the bag , Mr . Lee ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just my cameras , my clothes , and some books .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're not carrying any food with you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , Mr . Lee . This is just a routine check . Would you mind opening the bag for me ?
segments.speaker: S1
